data.title: Brewery; Restaurant
data.meta_description: If you want to enjoy flavorful appetizers and thirst-quenching beverages, visit our family-friendly brewery in Wayland, MI. Come visit us today!
data.text:
Since 2016, OpenRoad Brewery has been serving freshly brewed beer and delicious food. If you want to enjoy flavorful appetizers and thirst-quenching beverages, visit our family-friendly brewery in Wayland, MI. We’re located between Grand Rapids and Kalamazoo, just off exit 64 on US-131, in the heart of downtown.

Come and see what our brewery is all about. We promise you'll want to stay parked for a while.

Here at OpenRoad Brewery, we offer a variety of exciting ways for our customers to get involved and relax. You’ll appreciate that:

We have a mug club membership

We have 12 rotating beers on tap

We serve burgers, sandwiches and appetizers

We have indoor and outdoor patio seating

You’ll notice that we’re all about pouring fresh and cold beers, serving delicious food and fostering an awesome community.

Stop by our local taproom and restaurant in Wayland, MI today.

We offer a selection of brewery merchandise - from mugs to shirts and more! Stop by today OpenRoad today to check out our selection.

OpenRoad Brewery strives to be your go-to taproom and restaurant. Here are a few things that make us a preferred destination:

We have a pet-friendly patio area

We’re certified as an independent craft brewer

We’re a Hop Passport member, so bring your book

We were voted best beer in Wayland, MI two years in a row

Visit us soon to see the difference our unmatched hospitality makes. We look forward to serving you fresh beer and tasty food.
